metadata.title: CVE-2023-33204 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium
metadata.description:
sysstat through 12.7.2 allows a multiplication integer overflow incheck_overflow in common.c. NOTE: this issue exists because of anincomplete fix for CVE-2022-39377.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2023-33204` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

isag - 11.6.1-1ubuntu0.2+esm1
sysstat - 11.6.1-1ubuntu0.2+esm1
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: sysstat package in esm-infra/bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '11.6.1-1ubuntu0.2+esm1').
